comment.text: The "ProductNameWallet" translation key is used to display the product name formatted as a wallet. It is used in a UI component titled "Wallet Info" on a page that allows users to manage their account settings. Translators should replace "{productName}" with the actual product name.

usage.context:
<Text
 className={styles.walletInfoTitle}
 fontWeight="600"
 fontSize="14px"
 >
 {t("ProductNameWallet", { productName: t("Common:ProductName") })}
 </Text>
 <div
 className={classNames(styles.walletInfoBalance, {
 [styles.warningColor]: isBalanceInsufficient,
 })}
